markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Twigjack](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3222)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

“True” twigjacks, as they consider themselves, are found in wild forests alongside the fey they idolize.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Twigjack.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Twigjack](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3222)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=599" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=668" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 332 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50

</row>

**Weaknesses**
[axes](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=1) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
splinter +11 ([deadly 1d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Bramble Jump** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156), [Wood](/Traits.aspx?ID=508)) **Requirements** The twigjack is in undergrowth; **Effect** The twigjack scrambles into the undergrowth and instantly teleports to a square of undergrowth within 60 feet. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

**Splinter Spray** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The twigjack sprays a barrage of splinters and brambles from its body in a 15-foot cone, dealing 4d6 piercing damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). It can't use Splinter Spray again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-479" />
name: Twigjack

This movement doesn't trigger reactions. Splinter Spray Two Actions The twigjack sprays a barrage of splinters and brambles from its body in a 15-foot cone, dealing 4d6 piercing damage (DC 20 basic Reflex save). It can't use Splinter Spray again for 1d4 rounds.
